verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H5155>Nehiloth,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> Give <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H561>words,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H995>consider<s%> my <S%H1901>meditation.<s%>
<S%H7181>Listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H7773>cry,<s%> my <S%H4428>King,<s%> and my <S%H430>God:<s%> for to you will I <S%H6419>pray.<s%>

My <S%H6963>voice<s%> shall you <S%H8085>hear<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> will I <S%H6186>direct<s%> my prayer to you, and will <S%H6822>look<s%> up.
For you are not a <S%H410>God<s%> that has <S%H2655>pleasure<s%> in <S%H7562>wickedness:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1481>dwell<s%> with you.
The <S%H1984>foolish<s%> shall not <S%H3320>stand<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight:<s%> you <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>
You shall <S%H6>destroy<s%> them that <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3577>leasing:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H8581>abhor<s%> the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> and <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

But as for me, I will <S%H935>come<s%> into your <S%H1004>house<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H2617>mercy:<s%> and in your <S%H3374>fear<s%> will I <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

<S%H5148>Lead<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H4616>because<s%> of my <S%H8324>enemies;<s%> make your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H3474>straight<s%> before my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

For there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3559>faithfulness<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> their <S%H7130>inward<s%> part is <S%H1942>very<s%> <S%H1942>wickedness;<s%> their <S%H1627>throat<s%> is an <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6913>sepulcher;<s%> they <S%H2505>flatter<s%> with their <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>

<S%H816>Destroy<s%> you them, O <S%H430>God;<s%> let them <S%H5307>fall<s%> by their own <S%H4156>counsels;<s%> <S%H5080>cast<s%> them out in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of their <S%H6588>transgressions;<s%> for they have <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against you.

But let <S%H3605>all<s%> those that put their <S%H2620>trust<s%> in you <S%H8055>rejoice:<s%> let them <S%H5769>ever<s%> <S%H7442>shout<s%> for joy, because you <S%H5526>defend<s%> them: let them also that <S%H157>love<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H5970>joyful<s%> in you.
For you, <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> with <S%H7522>favor<s%> will you <S%H5849>compass<s%> him as with a <S%H6793>shield.<s%>
